oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Capt. Isaac A. Taylor, Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a CdV of Capt. Isaac A. Taylor, Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Taylor hailed from Carter Co., Tenn. and upon secession made his way to Illinois and enlisted in the 122nd Ill. Inf. Regt., USA. He received his discharge to accept a commission in the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA as a lieutenant. Promoted to captain of Co. B in March 1865, he ended the war as brigade acting adjutant general. He wears a star badge with crossed sabers which may indicate 20th Corps. He moved to Kansas after the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Taylor, Issac A.
